images.description: Hawaii!! Idean flew their employees to Oahu for their annual retreat.
Idean's office at their head quarters in Palo Alto. The home-like atmosphere of the house definitely reflects the friendly and relaxed atmosphere of the company as a whole.
Life's too short for crappy UX!

videos.description: Idean's introductory video: why a good user experience is important and how Idean can help.
